trans-unit.source: Converts instances of various types to and from instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將各種型別的執行個體來回轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of the specified type can be converted to an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定之型別的執行個體是否可轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This converter can convert from the following types:
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換器可以從下列類型轉換：

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的目標類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class can be converted to an instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 類別的執行個體是否可轉換為指定之型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 要做為目前文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The converted value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a valid type that can be converted to type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 型別的有效型別。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 要做為目前文化特性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the value to.
trans-unit.target: 要將值轉換成的型別。

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class to an instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> 類別的執行個體轉換為指定之型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The converted value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> or <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not a valid conversion type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />，或者 <paramref name="destinationType" /> 不是有效的轉換型別。
